faq.question: What is Castaccord?
faq.answer: Castaccord is a comprehensive Twitch chat management platform that helps streamers manage multiple bot accounts, create prepared message collections, and automate chat interactions. It provides both automatic and manual control modes for maximum flexibility.

faq.question: How do I get started?
faq.answer: Getting started is easy! Simply connect your Twitch account, import your bot tokens, and you're ready to go. Our intuitive interface guides you through the setup process step by step.

faq.question: Can I customize my bots?
faq.answer: Absolutely! You can customize each bot with unique colors, icons (badges), and nicknames. This makes it easy to identify and manage different bots in your chat.

faq.question: What are prepared message collections?
faq.answer: Prepared message collections allow you to create groups of messages for quick use. When you click on a collection, a random message from that collection is automatically inserted into your chat input, saving you time during streams.

faq.question: Is there a free trial?
faq.answer: Yes! You can start using Castaccord right away. Connect your Twitch account and begin managing your bots immediately with our free tier.

faq.question: How secure is my data?
faq.answer: Security is our top priority. All your bot tokens and account information are encrypted and stored securely. We follow industry best practices to protect your data.
